main event: A civilian observer reported seeing a spinning silvery disk in Portsmouth, VA on June 23, 1952.
interesting points: The object spun around for 15 to 20 seconds before flying north., The sighting lasted for 10-15 minutes., The observer described the object as a flat, silver disk., There was a mention of unusual heavy air traffic in the area., The report involved a detailed examination of the observed object.
witness description: Age 37, from the Electronic Wage Department, Norfolk N.A.S.
